medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began at about noon today, with progressively worsening pain over the course of the afternoon that migrated into the right lower quadrant. The patient also experienced fever and nausea, without vomiting. The last bowel movement was 3 days ago. The severity was moderate and the duration was hours.
medical_history.family_history: Father with diabetes mellitus, grandfather with coronary artery disease/myocardial infarction/hypertension. No history of cancer or inflammatory bowel disease in family.
